subject: Apology
title: SpamBotFromHell
text: I am writing to apologize for incessantly writing you emails.  It
must be tiresome to spend all day deleting them.
P.S. Please forgive me for sending this email.  I shall immediately
dispatch a second email in apology.
confirmation_msg: Are you certain you wish to proceed?
This cannot be undone and can have dangerous results!
